Load noaa_wildfires_monthly_stats.csv while skipping the first three non-data rows.
Clean the NIFC 'Fires' column by removing commas and casting the values to integers.
Get 'Year' column in the NOAA dataframe from the 'Date' field.
Aggregate NOAA records to annual totals by summing 'Number of Fires' within each year.
Inner-join the NOAA annual totals with the cleaned NIFC data on the 'Year' column so only years present in both (2000 onward) are kept.
For every matched year, compute the difference in fire counts (NOAA minus NIFC).
Take the mean of these yearly differences to obtain the average discrepancy.
Round this mean difference to the nearest whole number and print it.
